text: Senchal lake, located 10 km to the south-east of Darjeeling, is the main reservoir of potable water for Darjeeling, India. The lake is located at an altitude of atop a hill. The hill also has one of the highest golf courses in the world. A tourist lodge at Senchal serves as hotel to tourists.zubin.com This lake is a part of the Senchal Wildlife Sanctuary. ==References== ==Other websites== *Senchal Lake on Wikimapia Category:Darjeeling district Category:Lakes of India
title: Senchal Lake
